JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Evening shift worker for machine and tool production needed near Odense
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Jobbeskrivelse

Your primary task will be to work in a machine park with production of aluminum parts. These must be cut, shaped and engraved; all done via different machine systems.

Your task will be to stand by these machines, start and stop them, receive the items and sort them afterwards.

You will be part of a team of 3, where you will work closely together and coordinate so that production can run optimally.

Working hours for evening shifts are as follows:

15 - 23

It is a long temporary position of 6 months.

If you can see yourself in this position, send me an application at dfi@jobteam.dk.

Faglige Kvalifikationer

Knowledge of working with machines is a plus

It is not a requirement that you are trained, but it is a benefit

Personlige Kvalifikationer

Careful

Ok physics

Can work independently and in teams

Særlige Forhold

Pay: 150kr per hour plus extra evening allowance after 6pm.

Do you want to be a part of the team?

Then send me an application at dfi@jobteam.dk

If you have any questions, please feel free to call me on +45 75527550 (key 1).
